title: Scientific Method and Investigation

vocab.definition: An educated guess that can be tested
A factor that can change in an experiment
The part of an experiment that stays the same for comparison
What you learn from analyzing experimental results

teachingNotes: Walk through each step of the scientific method. Emphasize that science is about asking questions and finding evidence-based answers.
